author: yonik
msg: SOLR-2064 SOLR-2065 SOLR-236: support highlighting and debugging with search grouping

author: wrowe
msg: Reduce complexity and fix a regex.t based on observation by rpluem;
- follow the same logic of '=' for >[=] and <[=], skipping p->type chars
- introduce pskip logic to greatly simplify logging, track negation '!', '=',
and new comparators ">/<[=]", backspacing only for the purpose of logging.
It's trivial to expand this to the -X operators in the future.

o Cache the factory instance so that a single instance is used per module

author: jfthomps
msg: added comments field to blockRequest table
